title: Celtic Themed Music Pack - Volume 1
description: A pack of 9 themes, loops and stems of Celtic-themed audio delights!
longDescription:
Perfect for anything with a Celtic feel, a mixture of light and mellow, atmospheric themes, fun jigs and epic highlands. With bagpipes and whistles prevalent through many tracks, this pack is perfect for anything with a Scottish, Irish or Druid-y vibe and in places, appropriate for some epic action or heart-melting romance. Each theme comes with loopable stems for in-game adaptive experimentation...


*** This pack is also included in the Mighty MUSIC MEGA PACK - Volume 1 along with eleven other albums and assorted goodies at an amazing discounted price. Click HERE to check it out! ***


Please feel free to let me know about your project if it features my music so I can share and promote your game.


The Celtic Themed Music Pack - Volume 1 by Ethan Lewis Maltby is folky pack of authentic instruments and orchestral embellishments written for any project involving a Celtic feel. Includes full themes perfect for menus and loopable stems for in-game action.


CELTIC THEMED MUSIC PACK - Overview

- NINE main full tracks of folky, bagpipey, mellow and atmospheric themes: LISTEN HERE

- 10 sets of stems based off each theme which can be used for creating an adaptive score. Hear an example of how these stems are broken down HERE


MAIN THEMES [each comes with a loopable version + stripped back variation]

1 - Light and Bouncy - [02:00]

2 - Epic Highlands - [02:03]

3 - Peaceful Hillside - [02:06]

4 - Bubbling Streams - [02:21]

5 - A Highland Jig - [02:08]

6 - Mists on the Moors - [02:00]

7 - Travelling the Mountains - [02:13]

8 - The Army Approaches - [02:08]

9 - A Celebration - [02:10]
technicalDetails:
Features:

- All themes are FULLY LOOPABLE for total flexibility

- 20 Minutes of Fully Mastered themes ready for import

- THREE stems per loop to build each track plus an ENDING sting

- Professional Quality wav files, 16bit/44.1khz

- Composed and Produced by a musician with two decades of professional experience in Film, TV, Sporting Events and Theatre.


Number of Audio Wavs: 49

Number of Audio Cues: 49

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 30:19

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Additional Notes:

Please do let me know if you use my work on any of your games so I can share and promote.

For any questions, enquiries or if you are interested in collaborations or commissions, please feel free to contact me and for more information about my work, please visit my website.
